thread.title: The Most Hilarious Celebrity Tweets from the Oscars 2017
thread.title_full: The Most Hilarious Celebrity Tweets from the Oscars 2017

author: Lori Keong
title: The Most Hilarious Celebrity Tweets from the Oscars 2017
text:
What I was doing 9 years ago today.Everything is the same. pic.twitter.com/yKnCIuFMnk 
— Lin-Manuel Miranda (@Lin_Manuel) February 26, 2017 You get colonoscopies at the Kodak theater? I guess it might be the only place big enough. https://t.co/J87j7uBn0w 
— Seth Rogen (@Sethrogen) February 26, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below People get mad when someone says "Hidden Fences" but in their defense sometimes I say La La Hacksaw 
— billy eichner (@billyeichner) February 27, 2017 Seeing Mahershala Ali on stage, totally see Trump's point about Muslims. #Oscars2017 
— Kumail Nanjiani (@kumailn) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Lil Chano From 79th (@chancetherapper) February 27, 2017 Most Popular viola davis could stand in front of me and convince me i deserve to die and i would agree 
— Matt Bellassai (@MattBellassai) February 27, 2017 O Lord I need a GiF! @violadavis 
— Oprah Winfrey (@Oprah) February 27, 2017 VIOLA NEEDS TO RELEASE A DVD OF ALL HER SPEECHES 
— Chelsea Peretti (@chelseaperetti) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Yo La Tengo (@TheRealYLT) February 27, 2017 I admire the people interested in Hollywood enough to take a Hollywood tour but OK to miss the Oscars. #Oscars 
— Paul F. Tompkins (@PFTompkins) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 
— Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017 Most Popular
